WASHINGTON D.C PERIOD USANN4Undergraduate enrollments jumped by more than a third in the first decade of the twenty-first century. thats according to a new report by the National Center for Education Statistics. the federal report says the biggest growth occurred at forprofit colleges PERIOD

It was the fastest decade of growth since the 1970s. forprofit colleges enrolled nine percent of undergraduates in  up from three percent in  PERIOD
